page.title: 17 Local Events
page.content: Many of the local activities take place in the existing Village Hall in Beck Row, but about five years ago, a Comminuty Association was formed to raise funds for a new Community Centre. Sufficient money has now been raised to consider making plans for building either on the existing site or on a Parish Playground behind the School. Jumble Sales, Bring and Buy Sales, Discos and other fund raising events are held in the Village Hall by various local organisations. The Over 60's Club meets regularly and organises activities and events for the elderly and there is a Women's Institute that does much good work in raising funds for charity as well as providing interesting meetings for the ladies of the area.The Football Club has its own pitch on part of The Close near to the proposed site of the Community Centre.
